meta.content: Official web site of the Worthington, MN public school district. Serves students from Worthington, Bigelow, Rushmore, Reading, and Wilmont.

strong.a: Click here for ISD 518 Distance Learning Information

div.p: Text4Collegetext4college.com Our high school is participating in an exciting study conducted by American Institutes for Research (AIR) in partnership with the Minnesota State Colleges and Universities, the Minnesota Department of Education, and the Minnesota Office of Higher Education. The study tests whether text messages can help students enroll and succeed in college. In order to… Continue Reading

Seniors! Delivery Day for Graduation orders is next Wednesday, April 29th from 11-1:00 p.m. in the Student parking lot. This is a drive up event. YOU MUST STAY IN YOUR CAR! To help keep things running smoothly we ask that you have your full name written on a piece of paper in large print to… Continue Reading

a.title: Minnesota School Board Association (MSBA) Scholarship Awarded to Adam Koller, ISD 518 School Board Student Representative

h3.a: Minnesota School Board Association (MSBA) Scholarship Awarded to Adam Koller, ISD 518 School Board Student Representative

div.p: Congratulations Adam Koller, student representative on the ISD 518 school board, for being awarded the Minnesota School Board Association (MSBA) Scholarship. Adam has many achievements and talents in and out of the classroom. We appreciate all the efforts given back to your community in leadership roles, Adam. Follow this link to the MSBA announcement of… Continue Reading

a.title: Register Here for Childcare Available Through ISD 518 for Healthcare, Emergency, and Defined “Tier 2” Workers (Registration due by 12:00 p.m. the day before childcare is needed)

h3.a: Register Here for Childcare Available Through ISD 518 for Healthcare, Emergency, and Defined “Tier 2” Workers (Registration due by 12:00 p.m. the day before childcare is needed)

div.p: Free Childcare for Healthcare, Emergency, and Defined “Tier 2” Workers When: Wednesday, March 18 – Friday, March 27; 7:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m. (Registration requested by noon on the day before childcare is needed) Where: Prairie Elementary School (1700 1st Ave SW, Worthington, MN 56187) Eligible Participants: ISD 518 school-aged children (kindergarten through age 12)… Continue Reading

ACT Update: Due to the governor’s directive to have schools do Distance Learning through April, District #518 was not able to offer the ACT on March 24 or April 7 in the buildings. The make-up date for this year’s juniors will be October 6. Further information will be sent in August regarding sign up.

Worthington High School and Learning Center Seniors Graduation Cap and Gown Pick-up for ALL District 518 graduates:Wednesday, April 29 from 11:00 AM to 1:00 PM in the student parking lot at Worthington High School. For the safety of all involved, please follow these steps:– Pull up by the entrance doors in the student parking lot.… Continue Reading
